sentence.Network_en: Taxonomic species are defined on phenetic discontinuities, not on interfertility.
sentence.Network_cn: 分类学上的种是根据表型不连续性而不是根据互交可孕性来确定的.

sentence.Network_en: The temptation to recognize apomictic microspecies ( agamospecies ) as taxonomic species is far greater.
sentence.Network_cn: 把无融合生殖小种 ( 无性种 ) 作为分类学上的种来承认,这点具有更大的迷惑性.

sentence.Network_en: It falls outside the scope of the formal taxonomic categories.
sentence.Network_cn: 它不属于正规植物分类学的分类阶元的范畴.

auth_sentence.content: Like limbs at all all sorts of levels in the taxonomic tree, they are a good idea for getting along with the environment.
